title: SVG/EMF to PPTX Converter
description: Convert your vector graphics (SVG, EMF) to PowerPoint presentation while preserving vector quality

upload.area: Drag and drop SVG/EMF files here, or click to select

conversion.error: Please upload at least one file
conversion.processingComplex: Processing complex SVG files for PowerPoint compatibility...

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.step1: Upload multiple SVG or EMF files
howItWorks.step2: Each file becomes a slide in the PowerPoint
howItWorks.step3: Vector graphics are preserved (no quality loss)
